  - Provider-agnostic design
  - Device-agnostic design
  - Privacy-first approach

- commands/setup-cloud.md: Interactive cloud setup command
  - Guides users through cloud configuration
  - Supports clone existing OR initialize new
  - Git configuration validation
  - Device registration

### 3. Framework Organization
- workflows/: Organized workflow documentation \(7 files\)
  - Moved from root to .claude/workflows/
  - Better structure for framework distribution

- handInput/: Web session integration
  - CLI-AGENT-GUIDE-web-session-integration.md
  - session-2024-12-26-cloud-memory-design.md
  - Enables continuity between web and CLI sessions

### 4. Configuration Example
- .config.example.json: Template for user configuration
  - Local-only mode \(default\)
  - Cloud sync mode \(optional\)
  - Privacy settings
  - Sync preferences

âœ… Existing users: No changes, works as before

## Design Principles
1. Cloud is optional \(not required\)
